name: SPOD plugin for WooCommerce
author: SPOD - Spreadshirt-Print-On-Demand

sections.installation:
Either
1.1 Go to Plugins > Add New > Search for SPOD > Install Now
or
1.2 Go to Plugins > Add New > Upload Plugin > Upload https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wc-spod.zip > Install Now
or
1.3 Upload https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wc-spod.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
then
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu point in WordPress
3. Go back to the menu point SPOD and click on “Complete installation”
4. A new tab is opened, log in or register on SPOD
5. Accept the terms and conditions for connecting to WooCommerce
6. Go back to the menu point SPOD in WordPress and refresh the page
7. To define custom name for attributes “size” and “color” head over to Integration Settings on app.spod.com
sections.faq:
I get an error during installation, what do I do now?

  • “Error: An error occured in the request and at the time were unable to send the consumer data” : For security reasons, now you need to have a valid SSL certificate, and run the installation from a https domain.
  • “Not allowed”: Please go to WordPress Admin > WooCommerce > Settings > Advanced > REST API and delete all API keys starting with “spod – API (…)”. Then go back to Spod Plugin and click on “Complete installation”. This will retrigger the installation.
  • “Forbidden: You don’t have permission to access this ressource”: Please check security plugins and configurations and .htaccess file of your server that might still include some lines related to those plugins
  • For other issues or if the above isn’t helping, feel free to contact us with a screenshot/screencast and your domain.
sections.changelog:
2.1.2

  • Mark HPOS compatibility

2.1

  • Users having installed the SPOD plugin before 30th of January 2023 now have the possibility to migrate to the new, improved workflow. The old workflow will stop working in the next version, so we recommend following the steps shown in WordPress Admin > SPOD.

2.0.2

  • Improvement of Content Security Police for embedding spod service at the backend

2.0

  • new users will use the WooCommerce REST API workflow
  • existing users will have the posibility to migrate to this workflow in a future version

1.2

  • express and premium shipping type
  • improved debug log for image upload

1.1

  • new contact form page
  • new system report page
  • fixing of product image import bug

1.0

  • initial release
sections.description:
Meet the industry’s fastest print-on-demand dropshipping provider!

Meet SPOD. Our plugin equips you with everything you need to create, publish and sell custom-printed products in your WooCommerce setup. You simply upload your design on products from our collection, add it to your store and we will print, pack it and ship it for you directly to your customer.
With SPOD, you’ll enjoy lightning-fast 48-hour production and low prices to earn more from your shop in no time. Install our simple, easy-to-use plugin to get started with print on demand today!

Why use the SPOD plugin for WooCommerce?

  • Fastest turnaround in the industry: 48 hours or less
  • Wide assortment: 200+ products (and counting)
  • Worldwide shipping: factories in US & EU for localized production
  • Simple shipping prices based on order value
  • 20 years printing experience, backed by Spreadshirt
  • Happy customers, low return rates: less than 1% returns
  • Streamlined dashboard: keep tabs on your orders and revenue
  • Free design library: over 50k free designs to help you get started
  • Top-notch customer service

Why choose print on demand?

Print on demand (POD) means that every product from your online shop is produced to order. Print-on-demand business models are a perfect way sell your own custom products without the risk of high initial investment, overstocking products, or storing inventory. SPOD enables merchants sell products featuring their own designs or branding with no need to stock, produce, print or ship anything themselves.

The POD process is also inherently more sustainable than traditional fashion business models due to reduced overstock and rock-bottom return rates.

SPOD’s promise to you

We will support your online store with fast turnaround, reliable quality and 100% transparency – all wrapped up in a super simple tool. SPOD’s got your back – pinkie promise.

Download SPOD for WooCommerce and start selling your custom products today!

Useful links

  • Learn more about POD tips and advice from our SPOD Blog
  • Get help and documentation in our Help Center
  • Rate us on WordPress
  • Contact us
sections.reviews:
Stopped Working

By qrguru on November 25, 2023

Stopped working, no response from support, appears abandoned

SPOD.app appears to have tech issues as well, cant add products to WOO within their app. May have to revert to Printify or other service. Shame, Spod had good pricing

WARNING - SPOD DELETED ALL MY PRODUCTS

By tmlstockholm on March 17, 2023

DON'T USE IT. We had to close our webshop due to SPOD deleting all products (over 130!) without any communication. This is their answer when I contacted customer service:

Hello Tom,

Thank you for your email.

We're very sorry to inform you that the products were deleted by our devs due to an ugly bug they found.

Unfortunately, the products had to be deleted for good to get rid of this bug. According to them, you would have to create your products again.

Please feel free to contact us if you have any further questions.

Sincerely,

Cielo

Customer Service

Unable to Manage WooCommerce Integration!?

By mehtuus on March 11, 2023

The SPOD plugin was causing errors to my site (I’m not the only one who experienced this). When an update to the plugin was released, it corrected that error issue, but it created another show stopping problem.

The update took my existing WooCommerce integration which has ALL of my products and disconnected it from my store and a NEW WooCommerce integration was then connected to my store.

As of this writing, this SPOD plugin has no way to functionally manage your WooCommerce integration. There is no way from within the WordPress SPOD plugin to manage keys, disconnect the integration, or anything else. There is only the button link that sends me to the SPOD website, where also, there is no way to functionally manage the WooCommerce integration. There is no way to disconnect or remove an integration without deleting your entire SPOD account!! This lack of ability is worthy of zero stars.

Now, all my items are in the disconnected integration with no way to transfer them to the new connected integration, and no way to disconnect an integration from my store and reconnect to the other integration. This means I must recreate every single item from scratch. Will this happen again down the road?

To top it off, SPOD has yet to respond to any of my multiple inquiries. Needless to say I am not pleased.

works fine

By r3db0 on January 30, 2023

really nice working in the background

Takes forever to sync products

By knguyen2011 on August 30, 2022

It takes forever to sync products to Woo stores.

L'assistenza non si prende minimamente cura del cliente

By umberto69 on May 13, 2022

Pessimo plugin e pessima assistenza. ho installato il plugin e ho perso molto tempo per capire il funzionamento. Tutti i plugin di print on demand si integrano bene con woocommerce, SPOD no. Questo plugin non crea le classi di spedizione e bisogna inserirle manualmente. Roba da pazzi! Comunque, mi sono tirato su le maniche volenteroso di impostare il mio woocommerce per farlo funzionare con l'ausilio di altri plugin. Ho chiesto al supporto diverse cose, tra le quali la conferma della correttezza delle classi di spedizione che avevo impostato. Dopo tutto il lavoro che ho perso, l'assistenza mi ha risposto che devo andare a vedere le FAQ di woocommerce. Assurdo!!! Una brutta esperienza, ho disinstallato tutto immediatamente.

Great people, great support, easy to use product.

By Fourstarzz Media (fourstarzzmedia) on January 25, 2022

Thank you SPOD for putting this plugin out there. Support has been awesome. The feature we liked the most is the free designs. Helped us to get up to speed. Keep on rockin'!

Works great

By epicclue on December 15, 2021

Good plugin and easy to use. I was able to sync all my products. I had a couple of questions and the team was really helpful. Quality is pretty good and production very fast.
